roleset.name: remove the acetyl group from a compound

example.name: deacetylate-v; passivized, with product of the reaction
example.text: The chitin that is produced can then be deacetylated with sodium hydroxide to produce chitosan ( Tsai et al . , 2002 )

example.name: deacetylate-v; agent and instrument
example.text: To gain further proof for the enantiopreference of Lipase - PS with our substrates 1 � 12 , we deacetylated the enantiopure ( R)-acetate obtained from substrates 1 and 5 with K2CO3 / MeOH .

propbank.arg: To gain further proof for the enantiopreference of Lipase - PS with our substrates 1 � 12
the enantiopure ( R)-acetate obtained from substrates 1 and 5

example.name: deacetylation-n
example.text: on the converse , deacetylation of PTEN by SIRT1 deacetylase and , by HDAC1 , can stimulate its activity .

propbank.arg: by SIRT1 deacetylase and , by HDAC1

roleset.note: DEACETYLATE-V NOTES: Created for Bio-AMR annotations.
